string-array.name: dahboard_description
string-array.item: Explore and purchase a variety of products from clothing to electronics or easily sell your own, all on one convenient app.
Easily keep track of what you\'re selling with our app. Stay organized and know what\'s in stock and what\'s selling, all in one place.
Create a User role that manages the sales of products
Create an Admin role that manages sales, stocks, and the creation of Admin and User accounts
